import {Row,Col} from "react-bootstrap" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faPlayCircle, faCalendarAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "../Atomics/VideoCard/VideoCard.css" import ProductSlide from "../Atomics/VideoCard/ProudctSlide"; import { Player } from 'video-react'; export default function RelatedVideoCard(props){ const { id,title,time,videoTitleHref,url,shopUrl,videoTitle,videoCategories,shop,views,timeAgo,video,iconHref,imgAlt,imgHref,imgSrc}=props.vendorVideo; return ( <>
{title}
{ shop}
{views} views   {timeAgo} ago
); }
